pause.title: Pause
pause.description: Game is paused. Press the button to continue.

main_section.name: Konstantin Abramkin
main_section.description: I create interactive 3D experiences on the web.
main_section.subtitle: The beginning is always the moment of the finest balance. Every master of the web knows this. To study the path of the Web Developer, first place it in sequence: HTML, CSS, JavaScript. And then — build interactive worlds and three-dimensional stories. Place it in space: the Universe of the Web, where every line of code is like a detective trail, leading wherever your imagination takes you. And do not be deceived by the thought that your years have passed, or that school failed to teach you enough — just act. And then you discover true weapons: React, Node.js, and Three.js; the world of interactive maps with Mapbox; animations powered by Framer Motion or GSAP. And the modern Web reveals itself as a living world — one where the architect is you.

start_text.1: Привіт. Це мій сайт-портфоліо. Тут я хочу провести тебе стежкою, якою йшов сам — від дитячої любові до ігор до світу, де фантазія стає реальністю.

about_section.3d:
I have been doing 3D modeling for a long time — at first more as a hobby. Lately, however, I have immersed myself much deeper in study and practice to bring my ideas to life. In the CGBoost Cubic Worlds course and several Udemy lessons, I gained practical skills: environment modeling, basic shader creation, animation, character rigging, and much more.

Right now I feel that in this field almost nothing is impossible for me — all I need is time and a good idea.

On my blog, I’ve prepared full-length articles with step-by-step instructions for modeling Cubic Worlds — from the very first steps to building complete 3D scenes. You’re welcome to explore them here: My Cubic Worlds blog.
